name: openreads
tagline: A self-hosted reading tracker for books and reading habits
description: OpenReads is a self-hosted reading tracker that lets users track reading progress, manage book lists, and log reading habits. It features a clean, intuitive web interface built for reading enthusiasts.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Track current page or percentage completion for books in progress with visual indicators

features.title: Notes And Ratings
features.description: Add personal reviews, ratings, and reading notes to remember thoughts about each book

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find books quickly by title, author, or genre with sorting options for large collections

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Transfer reading data between devices or backup your library using standard file formats
